text: @SouthernOracle4 Good old Mistress Slightly, Vimes thought, looking into the dark eyes of the goblin girl, I have the evidence of his own eyes.

passages.fragment: Good old Mistress Slightly , Vimes thought ,
passages.full_quote: <used>Good old Mistress Slightly, Vimes thought, a</used>s he stood in this gloomy cave surrounded by ranks of silent, solemn goblins

passages.fragment: , Vimes thought , looking into the dark eyes of the goblin girl
passages.full_quote: No, I wouldn't, <used>Vimes thought, looking into the dark eyes of the goblin girl</used>

passages.fragment: of the goblin girl , I have
passages.full_quote: Regarding the murder <used>of the goblin girl, I have</used> sufficient information to warrant apprehending two men for questioning

passages.fragment: the goblin girl , I have the evidence of his
passages.full_quote: The man Stratford did kill <used>the goblin girl, I have the evidence of his</used> associate and the word of a being whose assistance has been of material use to society

passages.fragment: the evidence of his own eyes
passages.full_quote: But now the nightmare he had seen while brachiating across a dark alley would, if he had been human, have made him doubt <used>the evidence of his own eyes</used>
